text: Lucia Gai (born 3 May 1991) is an Italian rugby union player. She took part in the 2010 Women's Six Nations Championship, 2011 Women's Six Nations Championship, 2018 Women's Six Nations Championship, 2020 Women's Six Nations Championship, and 2017 Women's Rugby World Cup. She played for Rennes in the French women's championship. == References == Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Italian rugby union players
title: Lucia Gai
